description: Q for Jim: Review scoring criteria, do we want the subscores?, Accidentally allowed "don't do this activity" as a response on Q1, 2, 8 and 9 until 7/17/2014
domain:
[[[(q1+q2)/2] + [(q3+q4+q7)/3] + q5 + [(q6+q8+q9)/3] + q10]]] / 5 x 5

range is 5-20, higher scores are better
calculation: Set all negative values (ie. -44) to zero.  [[[(fosq_0100+ fosq_0200)/2] + [(fosq_0300+ fosq_0400+ fosq_0700)/3] + fosq_0500 + [(fosq_0600+ fosq_0800+ fosq_0900)/3] + fosq_1000]]] / 5 X 5
